synopsis.text: Hayate's acceptance of his role as Himawari's master brings a semblance of normalcy to the Village of Mist's girls' school, but not for long. The unexpected demolition of the boys' academy and the subsequent disappearance of all male students sets off a series of peculiar events. Unidentified ninjas begin targeting Himawari and her friends, and these occurrences seem to be interconnected. As the aspiring ninja, Himawari, along with Shikimi, Yusura, Himeji, Azami, and the clumsy Hayato, strive to unravel the mystery behind these strange happenings, they also delve deeper into Himawari's past. With secrets about the mysterious ninja who once saved her waiting to be uncovered, Himawari must stay vigilant to protect her friends and unveil the truth. Will she succeed in her quest for answers? Only time will tell.
